title: Rework ADC's entirely or give Melee a form of "dodge" back.
body:
ADCs are so horrible in this game. REALLY bad. And why does Vayne build IE and Static Shiv and suddenly rek everyone's day? ADCS are an OBVIOUS factor at what is making this game stressful. Unavoidable damage whilst being ranged is almost like saying they are going to do true damage. Dodge was an effective way to play against ADCs back then. (minus the broken shitt that old sivir was) 

The idea of Auto Attacks and ADCs needs to be reworked entirely or give melee a dodge chance or mechanic again. Even the ones with gap closers.

replies.body: Melee's will have to lose their mobility, then. gg

Which is why you either
A. Be an offtank and suck in that sweet damage and dish out just as much
or
B. ASSASSINATE
Or just remove lifesteal and/or crit chance (setting the crit chance to 5% per auto, flat)
